cards.rules_text: Sacrifice this emblem: Exile all permanents. End the turn. Take an extra turn after this one. Activate only as a sorcery.

Outlast {R} [i]({R}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)[/i]
{R}, {T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to any target chosen at random. Activate only as a sorcery.

Exile the top three cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play those cards.
Suspend 3–{4}{R} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {4}{R} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance and lifelink until end of turn.
Suspend 4–{W} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {W} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
[i]Landfall[/i] – Whenever a land you control enters, this creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If you controlled that permanent, draw a card.

When this artifact enters, create a Treasure token.
{1}, {T}: Target player mills two cards. [i](They put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.)[/i]

Defender
Exhaust – {2}{W}: This creature deals 4 damage to target attacking or blocking creature. [i](Activate each exhaust ability only once.)[/i]
Return up to three target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Freya's Blessing.

Deathtouch, lifelink
At the beginning of your end step, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. You lose life equal to its mana value unless a creature died this turn.
Rock Barrage deals 4 damage to target creature. Excess damage is dealt to that creature's controller instead.
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter on it. [i](If a creature with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)[/i]

Battle cry [i](Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)[/i]
When this creature enters, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

When this creature enters, create a Treasure token.
{2}, {T}: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

When this creature dies, create a 2/2 blue Harpy creature token with flying.

Counter target spell, activated ability, or triggered ability. [i](Mana abilities can't be targeted.)[/i]

Whenever Geralt enters or attacks, exile target card from your graveyard.
Geralt has flying as long as a card exiled with it has flying. The same is true for battle cry, first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.

As Schirrú enters, secretly choose one –
• [i]Assassinate[/i] – As long as it's your turn, Schirrú has first strike and deathtouch.
• [i]Infiltrate[/i] – Whenever Schirrú deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card.
Reveal your choice: Schirrú gains that ability. Activate only once.

Enchant creature
You control enchanted creature.
When you cast a spell, sacrifice this enchantment.
You may have this creature enter as a copy of a creature you control, except it isn't legendary.

Drones you control have haste.
When this enchantment enters, create a 1/1 red Drone creature token with “This creature can't block.”
{1}{R}: Create a 1/1 red Drone creature token with “This creature can't block.”
This token can't block.

Flying
When this creature dies, secretly choose a nonland permanent target opponent controls, then that player guesses which creature it is. If they guess wrong, destroy the chosen permanent.

Battle cry [i](Whenever this creature attacks, each other attacking creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.)[/i]
Exhaust – {0}: Another target creature gains haste until end of turn. [i](Activate each exhaust ability only once.)[/i]

{W}, {T}: Tap target creature. You gain 1 life.

Other creatures you control have outlast {2}.
Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has lifelink.

Triss attacks each combat if able.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Triss gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
When Triss dies, it deals damage equal to its power to any target.

Vigilance
{2}{W}: Exile this creature. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step.

Outlast {G} [i]({G}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. Outlast only as a sorcery.)[/i]
When this creature dies, put its counters on target creature you control.
Roll a six-sided die. You may reroll that die up to two times. Destroy all permanents with mana value equal to the final result.

When this creature enters, create a 2/2 green Bear creature token.
{1}{G}, {T}: Target Bear you control fights target creature you don't control. Activate only as a sorcery.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures your opponents control.

Defender
{T}: Put a hatchling counter on this creature.
Remove three hatchling counters from this creature: Create a 2/2 blue Harpy creature token. Activate only as a sorcery.

Target creature gets +5/+5 until end of turn. Up to one other target creature blocks it this turn if able.
Suspend 4–{G} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-2.
At the beginning of the end step of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.

Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens. You gain 1 life for each creature you control.
Suspend 2–{1}{W} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{W} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. When that creature dies this turn, create two 1/1 red Drone creature tokens with “This creature can't block.”

Korathi Heatwave deals 13 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
Suspend 4–{R} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Until end of turn, when you cast a creature spell, that creature enters with three additional +1/+1 counters on it.
Suspend 2–{3}{G} [i](Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {3}{G} and exile it with two time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)[/i]

Whenever you attack, choose target creature. Flip a coin. If you win the flip, put a +1/+1 counter on the chosen creature. Otherwise, remove all counters from it.
